info: Rating, 4 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Can’t complain about the host. He was amazing. He made arrangements for our early arrival. Due to early arrival we were put in a different apartment which is only a floor below. Everything was fantastic but there is a serious issue with the damp on the walls in 2 of the bedroom. Damps on the walls gave bad odours at all time. We had to buy air freshener all the time. Another good thing about this place was everything was supplied brand new. Also there was no hot water at the beginning but it was put right the next day.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: This is our second staying here. We were forced to come back as both the place and service were outstanding. I highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to stay in the Dhanmondi area.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · April 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
The host was quick in communicating and arranging things. The checkin was smooth and kindly agreed to our earlier time. Mr Mokbul’s contact in Bangladesh (Mr Mosiur) was reachable when needed.
Pros:
The place is big and the beds are king size. Comfortable for 3 people to sleep. There was some extra cushions to top up.
Secure with 24 hr guard, good amenities and Mosque nearby.
One of the guard was friendly and accommodating (Shofiqul).
Very good and new ACs, a life saver during heat spell of 38-40 degree. Working kitchen.
Negatives:
The maid who was supposed to come daily was inconsistent.
The access to lift from ground floor requires climbing 8 steps.
Termites on door frames of Kitchen and balcony door.
One of the guard was rude despite telling him earlier about needing lift at 5am for our flight.
The refrigerator door doesn’t close well and our food got spoilt. Asked to look into this but no one came.
To improve: Needs washing machine and more pillows to be a complete unit.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Spacious apartment. Clean and had everything we needed for our stay.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Location is totally wrong; the house itself on 46B building, but written as 46a, totally a separate building. How could this happen? The kitchen exposes dangerous molecules/mushroom like live bacteria (I have taken picture as a proof). All the drawers are filled with their extra storage material that made me surprise where should we put our stuffs. All the cleaning detergents including soap/ liquid were found empty. No people on check-in, key was handover by the security guard who can not provide any other help. TV remote had weak batteries,, etc. etc. Not professionally maintained!! The people talked over the phone had assistants to help who were kind of go around!! Otherwise the location was excellent and very homely if it is maintained professionally!!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · June 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment:
It was nice and clean and very comfortable.
I highly recommend it.

info: Rating, 1 star,  · May 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: When we arrived on May 9 this place was a hell. It was dirty and unhealthy situation. The bathrooms were dirty and smelly. We had to clean by ourselves. One of toilet was backing up and didn’t flash out. Under neath the bed there are lots of dirty stuff and dust. The rain water came to our two bed rooms and flooded. Our cloths, laptops and books all were wet. I had very terrible and bad experiences about this appertains. I should stay in hotel. So if you want to rent this apartment just think twice !!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Feels like living in own flat. Care taker is very responsible and helpful. Love to come back again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2022,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment:
I stayed in this house for a week.
Lication was very nice as few min walk from dhanmondi lake. Everything in the house was like someone still living did not feel like its rented. I will comeback again soon.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2021,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: We really enjoyed our stay in the house. Our concerns were addressed diligently and quickly.
rating_extra: Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · October 2021,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: It was really a nice place to stay in the middle part of the city. The environment was very nice, calm and comfortable. Dhanmondi Lake give you some extra benefits. Very spacious flat very much suitable for family staying.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2021,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: I would like to start with a big thanks and great appreciation to host for making proper arrangement for early check-in and we had enjoyed alot staying there. It felt we never left our home. 🙂 The interiors are superb with cozy beds and other facilities. My wife and kids really loved the place. Its in the heart of the city with walking distance lake view park and beautiful mosque. Overall total value for money.

Mokbul the owner is great and very responsive. Morshed the person in charge in bangladesh was also great and addressed any issues we had and was great about respecting privacy, which was a nice change from our prior Airbnb experience in Dhaka.
The apartment seems like it was recently renovated. Furniture and appliances are all fairly new and name brand and worked great. The place overall is much nicer than what you'd expect from the images. There are some extra floor pads/mattresses to sleep on if needed. There is also a smart tv in the living room to watch Netflix and youtube, which was a nice surprise as it was not listed.
The location is also perfect, being on the Dhanmondi residential side it's fairly calm but walking, using rickshaws, and calling ubers were no problem. In the mornings you still got vegetable trolleys and there is a small convenience store nearby to get essentials. Dhanmondi lake is a quick walk away and a nice place to spend mornings or evenings. Unimart is also very close and a great place to do groceries if going to the bazaar is not your cup of tea. There are also lots of restaurants very close by, and ordering delivery through foodpanda was a great experience, and unbelievably cheap, especially compared to door dash or uber eats in the states.
As far as things that can be improved, having more pots, pans and utensils would be nice. Some extra linens are also needed. There's no washing machine either, but Mokbul arranged other methods for us. The building also seems to lack a generator, however, we didn't experience super long power outages, so it wasn't too big of a deal.
Overall I would recommend Mokbul's place to anyone and would definitely stay again if/when we return.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · March 2021,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: The location is Good. Big Apartment. Mr. Moshiur, Who is the Coordinator of the Apartment is a very nice person. Cleaning & Hygenic Problem happen when we arrived but Mr. Moshiur tries to solve this issue. Maybe they are new to Airbnb and some mistakes happen. But overall it's a good place to stay with your family.
